lead_paragraph: Ginobili is out for at least a month after surgery Thursday for a testicle injury he suffered during the team’s win over New Orleans earlier this week.

headline.print_headline: Spurs Star Ginobili Out at Least a Month With Groin Injury
headline.main: Spurs Guard Manu Ginobili to Miss at Least a Month With a Groin Injury

snippet: Ginobili is out for at least a month after surgery Thursday for a testicle injury he suffered during the team’s win over New Orleans earlier this week....
